page.title: 20Questionnaire _ Summary
page.content: The questionnaire that was carried out was done in the small village of Lees,near Oldham.It is a small community,not really representative of the town.there are very few non_English people in the village. If the survey was carried out in Oldham there would have been a large percentage who visit a mosque or other places of worship not associated with an English town.This is because of the large Asian and Eastern European community that is an integral part of the town. The survey itself is very interesting.It shows that about one third of the community still attend some form of church,at least once a month, something that would probably not be true in a larger town.
